plugin.name: cas-client
plugin.author: Chen Wang
plugin.title: This plugin provides client integration for JA-SIG CAS
plugin.description:
The plugin handles configurations of JA-SIG CAS client integration using its Java client library versioned 2.1.1 with some added features. Please note there is another Java client library which is heavily Spring based; Although it seems a natual fit for Grails applications, it requires more configuration works to get started.
The client integration page of the library supported by this plugin is
http://grails.org/CAS+Client+Plugin
Please make sure necessary configurations are made in your Grails application's Config.groovy file.
